name.ja: マスター・オブ・<ruby>ＨＡＭ<rt>ハム</rt></ruby>

text.en:
2 Beast monsters
If this card is Fusion Summoned or flipped face-up: You can Special Summon 1 Flip monster from your hand or Deck in face-down Defense Position. If this card is in your GY: You can banish 2 Flip monsters from your GY and/or face-up field; Special Summon this card in face-down Defense Position, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Master of Ham" once per turn.
